org.jetel.util.string

Class Concatenate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.util.string.Concatenate

  • public class Concatenate
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for concatenating string using a glue (separator) Can be used either as state machine or by calling a single method. State machine: Concatenate c = new Concatenate(";"); c.append("stringA"); c.append("stringB;"); c.append("stringC"); String return = c.toString(); // c == "stringA;stringB;stringC"; Single method: String return = Concatenate.toString(";", new String[] { "stringA", "stringB;", "stringC" });
